backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two implemented features: restructuring StrategyCallSection.tsx into a three-box layout and removing the standalone LeadMagnetSection from App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short summaries describing each component's purpose, styling, and key functionality for the ProSellers landing page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, card, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the ProSellers React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all landing page sections in order with SectionConnectors between them; LeadMagnetSection has been removed and the flow ends with StrategyCallSection before the Footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Founder profile section featuring a headshot with gold corner accents, credential list with CheckCircle icons, and scroll-triggered slide-in animations for left and right columns.
frontend/src/components/CaseStudiesSecti: Case studies section displaying three client cards with before/after metric counters, animated count-up values, and Recharts bar charts showing ACOS, revenue, and conversion improvements.
frontend/src/components/ComparisonSectio: Renders a side-by-side comparison section contrasting US agencies with ProSellers across cost, access, and strategy points, using IntersectionObserver for scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Displays an accordion-style FAQ section with expand/collapse functionality for questions about ProSellers' Amazon consulting approach, pricing, and communication model.
frontend/src/components/FlagStripSection: Shows an infinitely scrolling horizontal strip of country flags with flutter animations, representing the 14 Amazon marketplaces ProSellers serves.
frontend/src/components/FloatingSideStri: A fixed bottom floating bar that appears after scrolling 700px, providing quick-access links for phone, email, and a Calendly booking button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying ProSellers branding, global service regions, copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GlobalServiceSec: Displays a grid of four country cards (US, UK, Canada, Australia) with flag images and market descriptions, using IntersectionObserver for staggered scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with an animated particle canvas, parallax scroll effect, count-up stat badges, and smooth-scroll CTA buttons for an Amazon consulting landing page.
frontend/src/components/HowWeWorkSection: Four-step process section displaying an audit-to-optimization growth framework in a responsive grid with intersection-observer reveal animations and a desktop connector line.
frontend/src/components/LeadMagnetSectio: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, smooth-scroll links to page sections, a 'Book Call' CTA, and a collapsible mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/PositioningSecti: Targeting section that lists ideal client criteria (revenue range, seller type, market) as checkmark bullet cards to qualify serious Amazon sellers.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Three-tier pricing section (Starter, Growth, Elite) with feature lists, a highlighted 'Most Popular' card, and intersection-observer reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/ProblemSection.t: Pain-points section displaying six common Amazon seller problems (high ACOS, suspensions, poor ranking, etc.) as icon cards with staggered reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/ScrollButtons.ts: Renders fixed scroll-to-top and scroll-to-bottom buttons that appear after the user scrolls past 600px, styled with gold accents and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/SectionConnector: Displays an animated gold pulsing dot with expanding rings used as a visual divider between page sections.
Renders a four-card services grid (Amazon Growth, Brand Development, Emergency Services, eBay Management) with scroll-triggered reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/StrategyCallSect: Displays a three-column section with a strategy call booking form, a WhatsApp contact option, and a PDF download form, with scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Renders a grid of five client testimonial cards with star ratings and scroll-triggered staggered reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/TrustSecuritySec: Displays four trust and security feature cards (confidentiality, NDA, payments, direct communication) with scroll-triggered reveal animations and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseSection: Renders a 'Why Choose Us' section with five animated glass-card tiles highlighting key differentiators (direct access, cost savings, limited slots, performance, partnership), using IntersectionObserver for scroll-triggered reveal animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates all non-actor queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module with no exports, indicating no backend queries are needed for this static landing page.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and Tailwind layers, defining CSS custom properties for the dark navy/gold theme, and utility classes for glassmorphism cards, scroll-reveal animations, and shimmer button effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom gold and navy brand colors, Cormorant Garamond/Inter font families, gold box-shadow utilities, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file recording version 29 of the ProSellers Amazon consultant landing page, documenting architectural decisions, existing features, known issues, and the latest change merging LeadMagnetSection into StrategyCallSection.
